citations.narrative:
Within the southwest pasture containing 26 sheep, multiple hazards were observed which could result in animal injury or
entrapment. The following issues were found:
1. a bent welded wire fence panel with protruding wire points adjacent to the Ritchie livestock water fountain located in the
center sheep pen area within the southwest pasture.
2. a bent gate panel with several broken welded wire segments with protruding wire points located in the 2nd west pen of
the sheep pens area within the southwest pasture
3. numerous gates and fence panels laying on the ground within the southwest pasture
4. a pile of discarded pipes, metal t-posts, welded wire and barbed wire fencing located within the north end of the
southwest pasture
Premises (buildings and grounds) shall be kept clean and in good repair in order to protect the animals from injury and to
facilitate husbandry practices set forth in this subpart (Subpart F, Part 3 of the Animal Welfare Act).
Correct by 08-22-2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
MARGARET SHAVER, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALIST n
